snippet: Economists said the latest jobs numbers were moderately encouraging, although some of them warned not to get carried away with the results of any single month -- especially December.
abstract: Economists said the latest jobs numbers were moderately encouraging, although some of them warned not to get carried away with the results of any single month -- especially December.
lead_paragraph: Economists viewed the latest jobs numbers as at least moderately encouraging, although some of them warned, as usual, against reading too much into the results of any single month -- especially December.

headline.main: Economists Take Solace (but Only a Little) in Jobs Report
